dl.dd: The view for the XULElem("tree"), which is the object which generates the data to be displayed. You can assign an object which implements interface("nsITreeView") to this property. Trees built from RDF or those which use XULElem("treeitem")s directly will already have a view. Functions available in the view allow one to retrieve the data within the cells, and determine which rows are nested within others. For a complete list of view functions, see the interface("nsITreeView") interface.
